column1: '''Willows''' were waterside trees that grew throughout [[Middle-earth]]. The most famous of these was the ancient tree known as [[Old Man Willow]], on the banks of the [[Withywindle]] in the [[Old Forest]].<ref>{{FR
In [[Beleriand]] was the region [[Nan-tathren]], a wooded vale which took its name from the willow trees that grew there.<ref>{{HM
